sentences.sentence: She had no personal or family history of hypertension or hyperthyroidism.
sentences.translation: 她没有高血压和甲亢的个人或家庭病史。

sentences.sentence: Results Aggregate efficiency is 86.9% for treatment Hyperthyroidism diarrhea by Asi antidiarrheal capsule.
sentences.translation: 结果阿是止泻胶囊治疗甲亢性腹泻总有效率为86.9%。

sentences.sentence: Treatment for hyperthyroidism may influence the development and the course of thyroid-associated ophthalmopathy (TAO).
sentences.translation: 甲亢治疗可能引起甲状腺有关眼病(TAO)的发生和恶化。
